title: mris_volmask
description: Computes a volume mask, at the same resolution as the <subject>/mri/brain.mgz. The volume mask contains 4 values: LH_WM (default 10), LH_GM (default 100), RH_WM (default 20), RH_GM (default 200).

cap_distance.title: Cap Distance
cap_distance.description: Maximum distance up to which the signed distance function computation is accurate.

label_background.title: Label Background
label_background.description: Override default value for background label value (0).

label_left_white.title: Label Left White
label_left_white.description: Override default value for left white matter label (20).

label_left_ribbon.title: Label Left Ribbon
label_left_ribbon.description: Override default value for left ribbon label (10).

label_right_white.title: Label Right White
label_right_white.description: Override default value for right white matter label (120).

label_right_ribbon.title: Label Right Ribbon
label_right_ribbon.description: Override default value for right ribbon label (110).

surf_white.title: Surface White
surf_white.description: Surface root name (e.g. <subject>/surf/$hemi.<NAME> - default value is white).

surf_pial.title: Surface Pial
surf_pial.description: Surface root name (e.g. <subject>/surf/$hemi.<NAME> - default value is pial).

aseg_name.title: ASEG Name
aseg_name.description: Specify a different name for the aseg input file (default is aseg).

out_root.title: Output Root
out_root.description: Output root name (default is ribbon). Output files would be, for example, mri/ribbon.mgz.

subjects_dir.title: Subjects Directory
subjects_dir.description: Specify SUBJECTS_DIR, default is read from environment.

save_distance.title: Save Distance Function
save_distance.description: Save the signed distance function as ?h.dwhite.mgz and ?h.dpial.mgz.

parallel.title: Parallel Processing
parallel.description: Run hemispheres in parallel and combine the result.

edit_aseg.title: Edit ASEG
edit_aseg.description: Edit the aseg using the ribbons and save to aseg.ribbon.mgz.

save_ribbon.title: Save Ribbon
save_ribbon.description: Save just the ribbon for the hemispheres - in the format ?h.ribbon.mgz.

io.title: Positional IO argument
io.description: Positional argument that represents input/output settings.
